title: The best Decathlon Black Friday deals | Save up to 30% on electric bikes, mountain bikes and more
content:
With discounts on everything from cycling gloves to electric mountain bikes, there’s something for everyone in Decathlon’s Black Friday sale.

We’ve scoured their site to bring you the best deals, so you can secure some savings this Cyber Week – whether you’re looking for a loved one or treating yourself.

If you’re looking for more, you can check out Decathlon’s sale page in full.

Best Decathlon deals

Triban RC 500 – £649.99 £499.99

Dave Caudery / Our Media

Decathlon’s Triban RC500 is a versatile and cost-effective all-round road bike we nominated for the 2022 Budget Bike of the Year.

Featuring a Shimano Sora groupset and accommodating tyres up to 40mm, the semi-compact 6061 aluminium frame with carbon fork offers a comfortable ride and includes mudguard and rack mounts for added utility.

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£499.99)

Triban RC 120 – £399.99 £349.99

The Triban RC 120 earned 4.5 stars in our review, making it one of the best cheap road bikes for 2023. This 16-speed road bike is versatile and comfortable, making it ideal for inexperienced riders to progress on.

The design of the frame prioritises comfort, featuring a longer head tube and a shorter top tube, which results in a more upright riding position compared to a traditional road bike frame.

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£349.99).

Madison Element Thermal Cycling Gloves – £14.99 £7.99

Decathlon

These lightweight Madison Element Thermal cycling gloves are claimed to be windproof, showerproof and breathable. Reflective stripes make them handy for cycling at night. Grab them for nearly half price at Decathlon.

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£7.99)

Riverside Original 920 E hybrid – £999.99 £699.99

The Riverside Original 920 E electric hybrid bike can provide up to 90km of assistance.

It has three modes, while B’Twin Trekking hybrid tyres, a Shimano TZ 500 7-speed freewheel and an anti-corrosion chain should provide trouble-free service.

The battery is backed by a two-year/500-cycle warranty.

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£699.99).

RockRider ST500 (kids 9-12) – £229.99 £199.99

This entry-level mountain bike could be an ideal choice for young adventurers aged 9 to 12 (135 to 150cm).  A basic suspension fork will take the sting out of big hits and a wide-range 18-speed drivetrain will make hilly paths more accessible.

Check how to find the right size bike for your child before purchasing.

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£199.99).

Btwin BMX Wipe 500 – £219.99 £169.99

With a compact geometry designed for easy steering, this BMX is ideal for young riders (9 to 14 years / 1.35 to 1.60m), so get a Christmas present in the bag early and save 22 per cent this Black Friday.

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£169.99)

RockRider electric mountain bike – £1,999.99 £1,799.99

Tackle the steepest terrain with the RockRider electric mountain bike. Powered by a 250W motor with 70Nm torque, the built-in motor assists when you need it, making light work of challenging climbs and obstacles.

With smooth pedalling assistance, a raised position for comfort, wide tyres, and a 120mm-travel RockShox Judy fork, it’s an ideal entry-level eMTB.

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£1,799.99)

RockRider kids’ 26-inch mountain bike – £279.99 £249.99

The RockRider kids’ mountain bike offers an easy-to-understand single-chainring drivetrain, child-friendly brake levers, and an easy-to-mount frame – it’s available with 10 per cent off this Black Friday.

  • Buy now from Decathlon (£249.99)
author: Maddi Lane
